scripts.build: yarn prepare:remote && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.build:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.build:kovan: yarn prepare:kovan && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.deploy:local: npx graph deploy --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ --ipfs http://127.0.0.1:5001 ensofinance/enso-v1
scripts.deploy:remote: npx graph deploy --node http://$DOCKHERO_HOST:8020 --ipfs http://$DOCKHERO_HOST:5001 ensofinance/enso-v1
scripts.deploy:kovan: npx graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ ensofinance/enso-v1
